# Contributing to Air Boss Support

Thank you for helping make Air Boss better! This guide will help you report issues effectively.

## üîç Before Creating an Issue

1. **Search existing issues** - Someone may have already reported it
2. **Check if it's reproducible** - Can you consistently reproduce the issue?
3. **Gather information** - Screenshots, error messages, device info

## üìù How to Report Issues

### üêõ Bug Reports

Use the [Bug Report template](https://github.com/bskyper/air-boss-support/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml) when:
- Something doesn't work as expected
- You encounter an error or crash
- Features behave incorrectly

**Good bug reports include:**
- Clear steps to reproduce
- Expected vs actual behavior
- Platform and version information
- Screenshots if applicable

### ‚ú® Feature Requests

Use the [Feature Request template](https://github.com/bskyper/air-boss-support/issues/new?template=feature_request.yml) when:
- You have an idea for a new feature
- You want to enhance existing functionality
- You need additional capabilities

**Good feature requests include:**
- The problem you're trying to solve
- Your proposed solution
- Use cases and examples
- Priority/importance to your workflow

### üì± UI/UX Improvements

Use the [UI/UX Improvement template](https://github.com/bskyper/air-boss-support/issues/new?template=ui_ux_improvement.yml) when:
- Interface could be more intuitive
- Visual design could be improved
- User experience could be enhanced

**Good UI/UX suggestions include:**
- Current experience description
- Suggested improvements
- User benefits
- Screenshots or mockups if possible

### ‚ö° Performance Issues

Use the [Performance Issue template](https://github.com/bskyper/air-boss-support/issues/new?template=performance.yml) when:
- App is slow or unresponsive
- App crashes or freezes
- Resource usage is high

**Good performance reports include:**
- Type of performance issue
- Steps to reproduce
- Frequency of occurrence
- Device/platform information

### ‚ùì Support Questions

Use the [Support Question template](https://github.com/bskyper/air-boss-support/issues/new?template=support_question.yml) when:
- You need help using a feature
- You have questions about functionality
- You're unsure how to do something

For general discussions, use [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/bskyper/air-boss-support/discussions).

## üè∑Ô∏è Labels

Issues will be labeled by maintainers to help with organization:

**Platform Labels:**
- `platform: mobile-ios` - iOS specific
- `platform: mobile-android` - Android specific
- `platform: web` - Web application specific
- `platform: both` - Multiple platforms

**Type Labels:**
- `type: bug` - Bug reports
- `type: feature` - Feature requests
- `type: ui-ux` - Interface improvements
- `type: performance` - Performance issues
- `type: question` - Support questions
- `type: documentation` - Documentation related

**Priority Labels:**
- `priority: critical` - Needs immediate attention
- `priority: high` - Important issues
- `priority: medium` - Normal priority
- `priority: low` - Minor issues

**Status Labels:**
- `status: new` - Newly created
- `status: investigating` - Being looked into
- `status: in-progress` - Actively being worked on
- `status: fixed` - Issue resolved
- `status: wont-fix` - Won't be addressed
- `status: duplicate` - Duplicate of another issue

## ‚úÖ Issue Quality Checklist

Before submitting, ensure your issue:
- [ ] Has a clear, descriptive title
- [ ] Uses the appropriate template
- [ ] Includes all required information
- [ ] Has been checked for duplicates
- [ ] Is focused on a single issue (not multiple issues in one)
- [ ] Includes screenshots/logs if applicable

## ü§ù Communication Guidelines

- **Be respectful** - We're all trying to improve Air Boss
- **Be specific** - Vague issues are hard to address
- **Be patient** - Maintainers are working hard
- **Stay on topic** - Keep discussions focused
- **Follow up** - Respond to questions about your issue

## üìÆ Contact

For private/security issues, please contact the maintainers directly rather than creating a public issue.

## üôè Thank You!

Your feedback helps make Air Boss better for everyone. We appreciate your contributions!

---

‚úàÔ∏è Happy Flying!
